6. Jean Lim

# Jean Lim

## About Jean Lim

Jean Lim was elected by Ward 3 in 2019. Her current term ends November, 2027. Jean and her husband Charlie have lived in Broomfield for nine years and have two adult sons.

## Education

Bachelor of Science in Computer Science and Master of Arts in Theology, Xavier University. Certificate in Teaching English as a Foreign Language.

## Professional Background

Affiliate Faculty, Regis University for six years. English as a Second Language Instructor.

## Political/Community Experience

Jean is currently serving on the following Boards and Commissions as a Council Representative: Advisory Committee on Environmental Sustainability (ACES), Colorado Communities for Climate Action (CC4CA), Counties &amp; Commissioners Acting Together (CCAT), Broomfield Workforce Development Board, Colorado Rural Workforce Consortium Board, and the Employee Medical Care Expense Plan Board of Trustees.

Prior to serving as a councilmember, Jean testified for three years at City Council, the Colorado Oil and Gas Conservation Commission and the Colorado legislature to protect the health, safety and property rights of residents living near oil and gas developments.

## Hobbies &amp; Interests

In their free time, Jean and her husband Charlie enjoy hiking, cooking, and traveling to historical and cultural sites.
